title: Ben Shapiro Takes Charge
author: VD
content_html:
Don’t worry, Patriots! Ben Shapiro is here to take over Turning Point USA and continue the work that Charlie Kirk gave his life for, which is of course advancing the Judeo-Christian agenda and encouraging young Americans to support all the important work that AIPAC and the ADL are doing for America!

Ben Shapiro announced today that he will “carry the blood-stained microphone where Charlie Kirk left off,” signaling his intention to continue the controversial legacy of his fellow conservative commentator. Shapiro made the declaration during a rally in Phoenix, Arizona, where he addressed a packed audience of supporters.

The rally follows Kirk”s recent departure from the political spotlight, which has left a void among conservative youth audiences. Shapiro, known for his sharp rhetoric and staunch conservative views, emphasized his commitment to advocating for policies that resonate with the American right, particularly on issues such as free speech and individual liberties.

Charlie Kirk, founder of Turning Point USA, has been a polarizing figure in American politics, often stirring controversy with his comments on race, gender, and politics. Shapiro”s embrace of this mantle suggests a potential shift in the dynamics of conservative media, as he seeks to galvanize Kirk”s base while also appealing to a broader audience.

As Shapiro steps into this prominent role, political analysts are keenly observing how his approach may influence conservative discourse in the upcoming election cycle. The conservative movement faces increasing scrutiny from various fronts, including recent developments in international politics, such as the USA pushing G7 to raise tariffs on China and India over Russian oil. Shapiro’s strategies may shape the narrative as conservatives prepare for a pivotal year ahead.

It’s going to be amusing to see how comprehensively Shapiro crashes and burns. And frankly, I don’t think an even more obvious “America is just an idea” gatekeeper is going to do much to prevent young Americans from becoming extreme nationalists, especially when that gatekeeper openly “doesn’t give a damn about the browning of America”, thinks Jesus Christ is just another criminal who got what he deserved, and has demanded the establishment of a US empire in the Middle East.

But it is rather comical to observe how little Benny keeps failing upward. I mean, he wasn’t even successful as a WND columnist. This is why Clown World is disintegrating. They’re elevating complete mediocrities to elite positions and violating the Peter Principle in ways that not even the most converged or nepotistic business would ever dare.

Meanwhile, Michael Savage is breathing a sigh of relief that he agreed to step aside when he did…
